product_summary: iApply Limited is an AI-based career finder and smart job portal that helps job seekers find the right jobs and employers find the right candidates. It uses AI to match job seekers with jobs that are a good fit for their skills and experience, and it provides employers with a pool of qualified candidates to choose from.
product_cons: Some features are only available to premium members
Can be time-consuming to create a profile
May not be suitable for all job seekers
AI matching algorithm may not be perfect

product_usecases.details: iApply Limited can help job seekers find the right jobs by matching them with jobs that are a good fit for their skills and experience.
iApply Limited can help employers find the right candidates by providing them with a pool of qualified candidates to choose from.
iApply Limited can help recruiters find the right candidates by providing them with a pool of qualified candidates to choose from.
iApply Limited can help career counselors find the right jobs for their clients by matching them with jobs that are a good fit for their skills and experience.
iApply Limited can help students find internships and entry-level jobs by matching them with jobs that are a good fit for their skills and experience.

product_toolfor.target: Individuals looking for a new job
product_toolfor.details: iApply Limited can help individuals find the right jobs by matching them with jobs that are a good fit for their skills and experience.

product_toolfor.target: Companies looking to hire new employees
product_toolfor.details: iApply Limited can help companies find the right candidates by providing them with a pool of qualified candidates to choose from.

product_toolfor.target: Recruiters looking to find qualified candidates
product_toolfor.details: iApply Limited can help recruiters find the right candidates by providing them with a pool of qualified candidates to choose from.

product_toolfor.target: Career counselors looking to help their clients find jobs
product_toolfor.details: iApply Limited can help career counselors find the right jobs for their clients by matching them with jobs that are a good fit for their skills and experience.

product_toolfor.target: Students looking for internships or entry-level jobs
product_toolfor.details: iApply Limited can help students find internships and entry-level jobs by matching them with jobs that are a good fit for their skills and experience.

product_pricing: iApply Limited offers a variety of pricing plans to fit different budgets. The Basic plan is free and includes limited features. The Premium plan costs $49 per month and includes additional features such as access to more job listings, the ability to create a custom profile, and the ability to track your job applications.
